title: Dill Pickle Dip
directions: Using a wooden spoon, press into the cream cheese and stir to loosen until smooth. Add the remaining ingredients and thoroughly combine.
Cover with plastic wrap and refrigerate for an hour before serving.
Serve with pretzels or veggies, or spread on a bun for a hamburger.
ingredients: 1 (8 ounce) package of cream cheese, softened to room temperature
